descriptions: ["DescriptionColdwell Banker is pleased to offer you this well-maintained 4 bedroom villa in Casa, Arabian Ranches. The Moroccan-styled CASA villas in Arabian Ranches bring a unique architectural concept to the integrated community. It is home to Arabian Ranches Golf Club and Dubai Equestrian & Polo Club and features 4,000 villas in distinct neighbourhoods, on-site schools such as the popular JESS, health care centres, retail outlets, cafés, and restaurants.
